ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller

Class FallingEdgeUSLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.FallingEdgeUSLocalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UltrasonicController

    public class FallingEdgeUSLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
implements UltrasonicController
    Performs falling edge localization. By spinning around, the robot is able to get the distances that surround it. with a certain threshold, the angles alpha and beta are those points. If the robot is on the 45 degree line, then the orientation of the robot can be calculated and corrected to face the true 0 degree.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FallingEdgeUSLocalization.AngleType
      List of angles detected: alpha is first angle detected, beta is second angle detected.
      static class  FallingEdgeUSLocalization.LocalizationType
      List of localization types
